plugin.name: Add Perseus Text
plugin.desc: Use me to add text segments from well known classical authors stored on the Perseus Digital Library.

plugin.name: Create Definition List
plugin.desc: Use me to create a definitions list based off this text.

plugin.name: Add Notes
plugin.desc: Use me to notes to this text.

plugin.name: Add Images
plugin.desc: Use me to add pictures to this text.

plugin.name: Output Project
plugin.desc: Take all the information you've created already and display it beautifully.
